mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.create_date as createDate, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.stock_name as stockName, t.type_name as typeName, t.stock_specifications as stockSpecifications, t.stock_count as outStockCount, t.stock_num as stockNum, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.delflag, t.officeinfo_id as officeinfoId, t.officeinfo_num as officeinfoNum, t.theme_id as themeId, t.update_date as updateDate, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName FROM oa_office_out_info t where t.delflag=0 and t.theme_id = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
